key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks with projected costs exceeding $1 billion in 2024
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities and data breaches, including a $3.25 million settlement
Customer complaints regarding premium increases, claims processing delays, and poor service
Climate change and natural disaster risks impacting claims payouts and profitability
Intense competitive pressures in the P&C insurance market
controversies: Class action lawsuit over a data breach affecting 347,100 individuals
Customer complaints about premium increases, including a case of a $40,000 annual premium
environmental_issues: Increasing frequency and severity of natural disasters affecting claims and profitability
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction with premium increases and claims processing delays
Need for greater diversity in the insurance industry as highlighted by the CEO
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny over pricing practices and compliance with state-specific insurance laws
Reliance on third-party vendors introducing cybersecurity risks
